content: Badges will highlight file activity — uploads, edits, or shares — across the {{rooms}}, {{shared}}, and {{documents}} sections.

comment.text: This text explains what file activity badges track—uploads, edits, or shares—in the Rooms, Shared With Me, and My Documents sections. It appears as a description accompanying a toggle button that controls these file activity notifications. Translators should ensure the terms "Rooms," "Shared With Me," and "My Documents" are accurately represented in the target language.
